titles: A vindication of The case of allegiance due to soveraign powers, in reply to An answer to a late pamphlet, intituled, Obedience and submission to the present government, demonstrated from Bishop Overal's convocation-book, with a postscript in answer to Dr. Sherlock's Case of allegiance, &c. by William Sherlock.
author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Wagstaffe, Thomas, 1645-1712. --  Answer to a late pamphlet entituled Obedience and submission to the present government.
Overall, John, 1560-1619. --  Bishop Overall's convocation book.
